tasks.task_description: Implement message history pagination for faster loading
Add message caching to reduce database calls
Optimize notification system with better batching

description: Optimize chat system performance and add online/offline features
context: Added message pagination with 50 message limit per load, message caching to reduce database calls, and loadMoreMessages function. Added online status tracking using Supabase presence.
Completed online status tracking implementation using Supabase presence API.

Added optimized notification system with batching to prevent UI spam, implemented typing indicators with TypingIndicator component and typing detection in EnhancedMessageInput, added load more messages functionality with button in ChatMessageView.
Added MessageStatus component with delivery status indicators (sending, sent, delivered, read) and integrated it into ChatMessageView to show message status for sent messages.
